title: Options used by the reviewer package — reviewer_options
text: reviewer package makes use following user-facing options: reviewer.chat supplies underlying LLM powering reviewer. chat argument review() takes precedence option provided. option can either: ellmer::Chat object (e.g., ellmer::chat_claude()) model string "provider/model" format described ellmer::chat() (e.g., "anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-5") Typically set .Rprofile:   reviewer.pending_edits controls maximum number pending edits allowed model waits user responses. max_pending argument review() takes precedence option provided. option must positive integer. Higher values reduce wait time may feel overwhelming risk edit conflicts. Defaults 2. Typically set .Rprofile:   reviewer.memory specifies path file reviewer stores user preferences learned accepted/rejected edits. set, reviewer uses file without prompting. set, reviewer ask permission write ~/.config/reviewer/memory.md first launch. Typically set .Rprofile:
code: options(reviewer.chat = ellmer::chat_claude(model = "claude-sonnet-4-5")) # or options(reviewer.chat = "openai/gpt-5") options(reviewer.pending_edits = 5) options(reviewer.memory = "~/.config/reviewer/memory.md")
